'''Narthseg''' was an [[Elf]] of [[Artanor]].

== History ==
Narthseg belonged to the people of [[Artanor]], but later betrayed both Artanor and [[Thingol|Tinwelint]] his king by revealing crucial information to [[Naugladur]] lord of [[Nogrod]] which resulted in Tinwelint's death and the sack of Artanor. He was slain in that fighting.<ref>{{LT2|IV}}, p. 231</ref>

==Etymology==
'''Narthseg''' is [[Gnomish]], though it is not glossed. In Gnomish, ''narth'' means "odour"<ref name="pe11">{{PE|11}}</ref>{{rp|59}} and ''seg'' means "middle point".<ref name="pe11"/>{{rp|67}} As words for "centre" are often used to refer to "heart", this may then mean "Odorous Heart" (cf. ''MalcamectÃ«'': "Heart of Evil").
